Common.SpaceDescription.Common.Text: Sublease space available from current tenant. High end corner trophy space with office intensive layout, kitchen, print/copy room and fully built out as law office. The space fits 44-141 people and can be combined with additional space(s) for up to 35,128 SF of adjacent space.

Sublease space available from current tenant. High end corner trophy space with office intensive layout, kitchen, private restrooms and fully built out as law office. The space fits 45-141 people.

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The building sits at the intersection of Liberty Avenue, Sixth Avenue and Wood Street. Convenient to public transit and major roadways including I-279 and I-376 Integral garage parking available Starbucks and banking on-site

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
K&L Gates Center is a Class A 4 Star skyscraper office building located in Downtown Pittsburgh. 
SUBLEASE TERMS Available: Up to 53,093 SF Available for immediate occupancy. Floors: 9th, 10th, and/or 18th thru 10/31/24 

Sleek, modern office space in excellent condition with demountable partitions allow for easy conversion to open plan design. Outstanding views in all directions. Select high grade furniture, fixtures, and equipment available. File room with reinforced floors and open ceiling. Large kitchen with seating for up to 24 people.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: 53,093 SF of 4-Star Office Space Available in Pittsburgh, PA
